description:
runtime: use persistentalloc instead of SysAlloc in GC
Especially important for Windows because it reserves VM
only in multiple of 64k.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://dvyukov%40google.com@code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=181b703d6dc4 ***

runtime: use persistentalloc instead of SysAlloc in GC
Especially important for Windows because it reserves VM
only in multiple of 64k.
